title: Global shares trade lower after AI darlings prop up Wall Street
description: Global shares have retreated despite the big lift in overseas markets from optimism over artificial intelligence technology
content:
TOKYO (AP) — Global shares retreated Tuesday despite the big lift in overseas markets from optimism over artificial intelligence technology, as traders sold shares to lock in recent profits.
France's CAC 40 lost 1.3% in early trading to 8,007.48, whi... [1715 chars]

title: Microsoft signs deal for cloud services
description: Microsoft has entered into a $9.7 billion cloud services contract with artificial intelligence cloud service provider IREN that will give it access to some of Nvidia's chips.
content:
Microsoft has entered into a $9.7 billion cloud services contract with artificial intelligence cloud service provider IREN that will give it access to some of Nvidia's chips.
The five-year deal, which includes a 20% prepayment, will help Microsoft as... [5476 chars]

title: UAE: Demands to boost oil prices
description: ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates -- Abu Dhabi opened a major oil summit Monday with officials offering bullish optimism that power demands for artificial intelligence and global aviation will boost energy prices, just hours after OPEC+ paused production increases planned for next year.

title: Accubits Invent wins patent for advanced medical diagnostic sensor
description: Accubits operates from Bio360 Life Sciences Park in Thiruvananthapuram, and integrates biotechnology; artificial intelligence; and material science to create diagnostic platforms
content:
Accubits Invent, a deep-tech start-up, has secured a patent for its sensor for ‘breath-based VOC (volatile organic compounds),’ opening up opportunities in non-invasive medical diagnostics.

title: Nearly 46% of business leaders now leverage Gen AI on daily basis: Report
description: Generative Artificial Intelligence (Gen AI) is no longer an experiment; it has become an integral part of daily work across various industries. According to the latest Wharton Human-AI Research report, 46 per cent of business leaders now use Gen AI every day, marking a 17-point jump from last year, while more than 80 per cent engage with it weekly.

title: Palantir exceeds expectations and raises its annual targets thanks to rise of artificial intelligence

title: Forget about artificial intelligence, here comes artificial life-like material
description: The study explores how model microcompartments can utilise chemical reactions hosted within to power outward fluid flow around themselves and regulate their local interactions.
content: A group of researchers at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Roorkee has developed tiny hydrogels that show life-like behaviour. Like humans, these hydrogels require chemical fuel (food) to function and interact with other small particles in a ... [1891 chars]

title: Microsoft unveils $15.2b AI, cloud expansion plan in UAE

content:
Microsoft has announced a $15.2 billion strategic investment in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) by 2029, a move aimed at boosting artificial intelligence and cloud computing.
